comments.body: Given all these params are available in the parent is there a reason you put this here?
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -145,6 +146,10 @@ private[ui] class StreamingPage(parent: StreamingTab)
   private val listener = parent.listener
   private val startTime = System.currentTimeMillis()
 
+  parent.parent.attachHandler(
+    StreamingApiRootResource.getServletHandler(parent.parent, listener, startTime)

comments.body:
the main reason is to maintain the consistency of startTime between the original webUI and the api
maybe it is better to record a start time from the start of streaming context or the listener itself
but that will be a change in definition.

comments.body: If it's for consistency it would be better to add it to the context or listener, I'm not too familiar with the details of the streaming context but adding it to the listener should be fine if the context isn't. Someone with more streaming background would know better though.
